2015.title: eunicode
2015.description: My personal website, the one you're on!
2015.short: My personal website, the one you're on!

2015.title: Got Issues
2015.description: As a Code2040 Fellow, I assisted with network platforms within the technology team, helping understand data from the Civic Issue Finder. Learned a lot about the civic technology ecosystem with a local and international context.
2015.short: Helped understand data from the Civic Issue Finder

2015.title: Code2040 Fellow
2015.description: I had the most incredible opportunity to be immersed within the technology sphere in Silicon Valley surrounded by Black and Latinx founders, engineers, friends, and role models. I couldn't trade the experience for anything else!
2015.short: My summer of immersion in the tech sphere in Silicon Valley

2015.title: She++ Ambassador
2015.description: More technology puns! This is an awesome group working towards inclusivity in all realms of tech, especially within our university's Computer Science Departments. I was the Columbia Ambassador for a year and got to meet other women and people working towards reaching out for the goal of equal opportunity and support in our education.
2015.short: Columbia ambassador creating programs to support inclusivity in our CS Dept

2015.title: ADI Committee Member
2015.description: A group of students at Columbia working to strengthen the technical community on campus through workshops, mentorship opportunities, and more! I did a ton of social media oversight as well as event + program planning

2015.title: Feelings
2015.description: Created an application with my 9 year old sister after watching Inside Out.
2015.short: Creating apps with my little sister!

2015.title: StoneSoup
2015.description: Created at DevFest, Columbia's Annual Hackathon in about 5 hours! We dynamically take queries of ingredients and spit out recipies based on those incredients and sort them by close fit & popularity
2015.short: Hackathon project to get recipes from incredients

2014.title: HairSOS
2014.description: Created at NSBE's national hackathon and this was my first hack.
2014.short: My first app, we (tried to) map relevant hair dressers fit for you

2014.title: Teaching Assistant @ MITES
2014.description: I served as a mentor, teaching assistant, and residential counselor for the MITES program.
2014.short: mentor, teaching assistant, and residential counselor

2014.title: Lab Consultant @CUIT
2014.description: I debugged computer equipment and dealt with technical issues weekly.
